welcome.label: Welcome
welcome.title: Platform setup
welcome.description: This brief guide explain the main points of each mandatory step in order to setup the platform for a super-admin user like you.
welcome.organizationDescription: Complete the basic information about your organization and create super-admin user. If you have more than one center/school you can indicate this later.
welcome.mailProvidersDescription: Configure your providers and email accounts for the management of platform notifications, you can setup as many accounts as you want and later assign them to your different centers.
welcome.languagesDescription: Choose the main language of interface platform and for content. You can customize it by centers later.
welcome.centersDescription: You can configure the type of information you want to include in each center. There is some basic system fields, but you can add as many fields as you need.
welcome.profilesDescription: Define the profiles for your platform, choose the default profiles (admin, teacher, parent), customize them or create new ones.
welcome.adminUsersDescription:
Create new Admin Users in order to finish the setup of Leemons:
- Create programs
- Curriculums
- Academic Rules
- Subjects
- Enroll students…

profiles.label: Profiles
profiles.title: User profiles
profiles.description:
Use the user profiles to manage permissions for applications. Each time you install a new Leemon (plugin) we will ask you to define permissions for each existing profile.

There are four default profiles included in the platform, if you want to create custom profiles, you could use one of them as template and add extra permissions or create a new one from scratch.
profiles.name: Name

organization.label: Organization
organization.title: Organization
organization.description: Please complete the basic information about your organization for administrative purposes. If you have more than one school you can indicate this later.
organization.domainUrlDescription: You have to specify the web domain of your installation (we recommend https domain with update security certificate). To modify this domain in the future you must delete all data from the platform installation database (not recommended). Please use complete URL (with www).
organization.lookAndFeelDescription: You can change the logo URL later when your Leemons Media Library will be ready and correctly setup in the cloud.
organization.superAdminCredentialsDescription: This super administrator user has access to the advanced settings of the system. In the last step of this setup, you will be able to create standard administrators who will have access to the plugins related to the training experience and will have their own setup path.
organization.administrativeContactInfoDescription: This information will be use only as notification signature in order to complain GDPR and other privacy international laws.Please check if this information is mandatory in your country.
organization.useDarkMode: Enable Dark mode in the side menu
organization.usePicturesEmptyStates: Use illustrations when no results are found in the listings
